content: So as where we say from an adjacency, this is already a $20 million plus business in international for us. We are able to have multiple points of interruptions in the store, and I think with our team in North America, which is doing a great job across all the brands coming together, working together, we do see opportunities in North America too. So as where we say from an adjacency, this is already a $20 million plus business in international for us. We are able to have multiple points of interruptions in the store, and I think with our team in North America, which is doing a great job across all the brands coming together, working together, we do see opportunities in North America too.
